list.abs: ... 394.stroke your head: 抚摸你的头 395.be strongarmed to do: 被强迫做 396.get your women in line: 管好你们的女人.

entry.tran: (策略、方法)强硬的，铁拳的，使用暴力强制的，横施淫威的
entry.def: If you refer to someone's behaviour as strong-arm tactics or methods, you disapprove of it because it consists of using threats or force in order to achieve something.

example.ex: The money has been recovered without resorting to verbal abuse or strong-arm tactics...
example.tran: 没有恶语相向也没有大动干戈就把这笔钱要回来了。

example.ex: The paper is openly critical of the strong-arm president.
example.tran: 该报纸对这位铁腕总统进行公开的批评。

auth_sentence.content: Their Strongarm device can be mounted to a power wheelchair and is able to lift up to 250 pounds.
auth_sentence.res_content: Their Strongarm device can be mounted to a power wheelchair and is able to lift up to 250 pounds.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Their Strongarm device can be mounted to a power wheelchair and is able to lift up to 250 pounds.
